verses.text: Run ye to and \w fro|strong="H7751"\w* through the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* now, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* in the broad \w places|strong="H7339"\w* thereof, if ye can \w find|strong="H4672"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, if there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \add any\add* that \w executeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, that \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*; and I will \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* it.
And though they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; surely they \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add are\add* not thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* upon the \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*? thou hast \w stricken|strong="H5221"\w* them, but they have not \w grieved|strong="H2342"\w*; thou hast \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them, \add but\add* they have \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*: they have made their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w harder|strong="H2388"\w* than a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*; they have \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

Therefore I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely these \add are\add* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*; they are \w foolish|strong="H2973"\w*: for they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add nor\add* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

I will \w get|strong="H3212"\w* me unto the great \w men|strong="H1419"\w*, and will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them; for they have \w known|strong="H3045"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: but these have \w altogether|strong="H3162"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, \add and\add* \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* the \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w*.

Wherefore a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* out of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* them, \add and\add* a \w wolf|strong="H2061"\w* of the \w evenings|strong="H6160"\w* shall \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* them, a \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* shall \w watch|strong="H8245"\w* over their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: every one that goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thence \w shall|strong="H2007"\w* be torn in \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*: because their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* are \w many|strong="H7231"\w*, \add and\add* their \w backslidings|strong="H4878"\w* are \w increased|strong="H6105"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft evenings: or, deserts\f*\f + \fr 5.6 \ft are increased: Heb. are strong\f*

¶ \w How|strong="H0335"\w* shall I \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* thee for \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by \add them that are\add* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: when I had fed them to the \w full|strong="H7650"\w*, they then committed \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, and assembled themselves by \w troops|strong="H1413"\w* in the \w harlots’|strong="H2181"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.

They were \add as\add* \w fed|strong="H2109"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H7904"\w*: every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w neighed|strong="H6670"\w* after his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

Shall I not \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* for these \add things\add*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and shall not my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* be \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* on such a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* as this?

¶ Go ye \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon her \w walls|strong="H8284"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*; but \w make|strong="H6213"\w* not a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w*: take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* her \w battlements|strong="H5189"\w*; for they \add are\add* not the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* have dealt \w very|strong="H0898"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* against me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

They have \w belied|strong="H3584"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* not he; neither shall \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us; neither shall we \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* nor \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*:
And the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* shall become \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and the \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \add is\add* not in them: thus shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto them.

Wherefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Because ye \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, behold, I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them.

Lo, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* upon you from \w far|strong="H4801"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it \add is\add* a \w mighty|strong="H0386"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, it \add is\add* an \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* whose \w language|strong="H3956"\w* thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not, neither \w understandest|strong="H8085"\w* what they \w say|strong="H1696"\w*.
Their \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* \add is\add* as an \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w*, they \add are\add* all mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

And they shall eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thine \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, and thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \add which\add* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* should \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: they shall eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and thine \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*: they shall eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w vines|strong="H1612"\w* and thy fig \w trees|strong="H8384"\w*: they shall \w impoverish|strong="H7567"\w* thy \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, wherein \w thou|strong="H2007"\w* \w trustedst|strong="H0982"\w*, with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.
Nevertheless in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* with you.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Wherefore|strong="H8478"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* all these \add things\add* unto us? then shalt thou \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* them, Like as ye have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, so shall ye \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* in a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add that is\add* not yours.
\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* this in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* it in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now this, O \w foolish|strong="H5530"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and without \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*; which have \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not; which have \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* not:\f + \fr 5.21 \ft understanding: Heb. heart\f*

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye not me? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: will ye not \w tremble|strong="H2342"\w* at my \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, which have \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \add for\add* the \w bound|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* by a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w decree|strong="H2706"\w*, that it cannot \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* it: and though the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof \w toss|strong="H1607"\w* themselves, yet can they not \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*; though they \w roar|strong="H1993"\w*, yet can they not pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* it?

But this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hath a \w revolting|strong="H5637"\w* and a \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; they are \w revolted|strong="H5493"\w* and \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*.

Neither \w say|strong="H0559"\w* they in their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, Let us now \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, both the \w former|strong="H3138"\w* and the \w latter|strong="H4456"\w*, in his \w season|strong="H6256"\w*: he \w reserveth|strong="H8104"\w* unto us the \w appointed|strong="H2708"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* of the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

¶ Your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* have turned \w away|strong="H5186"\w* these \add things\add*, and your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* have \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add things\add* from you.

For among my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add men:\add* they lay \w wait|strong="H7789"\w*, as he that \w setteth|strong="H7918"\w* \w snares|strong="H3353"\w*; they \w set|strong="H5324"\w* a \w trap|strong="H4889"\w*, they \w catch|strong="H3920"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.\f + \fr 5.26 \ft they lay…: or, they pry as fowlers lie in wait\f*

As a \w cage|strong="H3619"\w* is \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w birds|strong="H5775"\w*, so \add are\add* their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*: therefore they are become \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, and waxen \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*.\f + \fr 5.27 \ft cage: or, coop\f*

They are waxen \w fat|strong="H8080"\w*, they \w shine|strong="H6245"\w*: yea, they \w overpass|strong="H5674"\w* the \w deeds|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*: they \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* not the \w cause|strong="H1779"\w*, the cause of the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, yet they \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*; and the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* do they not \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*.

Shall I not \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* for these \add things\add*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: shall not my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* be \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* on such a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* as this?

¶ A \w wonderful|strong="H8047"\w* and horrible \w thing|strong="H8186"\w* is \w committed|strong="H1961"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;\f + \fr 5.30 \ft A wonderful…: or, Astonishment and filthiness\f*

The \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* bear \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* by their \w means|strong="H3027"\w*; and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \add to have it\add* so: and what will ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* thereof?\f + \fr 5.31 \ft bear…: or, take into their hands\f*
